author: Aereus

text: @unionofonion till you after the credits it becomes a great ending. sure they dont remember what happen or that they were the best of friends, but some of those kids died. so seeing them all together running in the hallways is an amazing way to end this one fantastic under rated game.

text:
Well, the guys at Enix didn't like happy endings, at least for the trilogy Soul Blaze/Illusion of Gaia/Terranigma.
